#NewcastleUnderLyme #Staffordshire https://t.co/RONYXq24r7
@StinkStopthe @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids I am really confused as to how the permit not been suspended and the site closed down. ü§¶ How long must this go on for ? ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è
5 more breaches!!! @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids When are you going to act!!!! #stopthestink #capitoff https://t.co/RpAlwO3lYB

@davemh72 @tayz_BETH @ollyandpatch Sadly it will lead to unsavoury civilian action and the civilians will then be prosecuted despite this being entirely the result of the @EnvAgency & the govt who I believe are more culpable than @RedIndustries2 #stopthestink

tweets.text: @tayz_BETH @SianieRoo @ollyandpatch It does seem as though we aren't being heard right now , but we can't stop and let them win .

It‚Äôs #INNSweek! Floating Pennywort is a non-native species which spreads throughout a watercourse rapidly and causes issues with navigation and water quality. We‚Äôve been out in #Leicester to monitor its spread and target effective treatment on the River Soar @InvasiveSp https://t.co/bzzQJxx68K
@tayz_BETH @LoneRanger77777 @JuliaBradbury @KeeleUniversity @KeeleSU @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe Our town and community are being destroyed. #StopTheStink

Please @JuliaBradbury The once beautiful view across NUL and Stoke   from @KeeleUniversity @KeeleSU which was stunning has been blighted by this and now we are just stunned. Our view and liberation to enjoy the outdoors are fouled. @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe https://t.co/KZWPMbKtrk

And why no enforcement&no financial penalties @EnvAgency ?Breach after breach but no punishment/incentive to stop.They‚Äôre too busy dumping waste to finish your instructions anyway which you‚Äôre partially responsible for when you refused to curtail their waste ops #stopthestink https://t.co/9rw3vW5riw

tweets.text:
The @EnvAgency have become a useless toothless organisation.Plenty more pollution issues in the Uk going unresolved as EA won‚Äôt act.
This one is something different though, why normalise health harms? It makes no sense #stopthestink https://t.co/NrA0uTgEwa

@JillyPStaffs @davemh72 @scottdegg @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgency @DefraUKAir @DefraGovUK @JuliaBradbury I think we should be suing the @EnvAgency now as we are suffering health harms and have proof of dereliction of duty and no duty of care. There has been no adequate action to resolve health harms and health harms continue to be normalised and accepted @StinkStopthe

Unfortunately I don't think #WalleysQuarry will be shut down. I suspect pressure from central government is being applied to keep it open. That would explain why @EnvAgencyMids have completely abandoned their role as regulator and taken on the role of facilitator.

#StopTheStink

Wild fish and their waters need your help. We have launched a Parliamentary Petition to give @EnvAgency the funds and freedom they need to protect English rivers. Please sign and share our petition to give rivers a fighting chance. #standingupforrivers
https://t.co/oxNkHEqHQL https://t.co/0sZJF68qs8

In partnership with @EnvAgency and @LeedsCC_News, we have planted over 5,000 trees at the University‚Äôs Brownlee Triathlon Centre to reduce flood risk and create a #LivingLab for innovation and research üå≥https://t.co/Ih7eG0QZgu

tweets.text: @EnvAgencyMids What does it take for something to be done #stopthestink

@davemh72 @scottdegg @SianieRoo @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgency @DefraUKAir @DefraGovUK @JuliaBradbury The government depts are afraid of Red/Walleys‚Äò  Barristers hence  residents have to suffer the menace.  We need a law firm to take on the Company to resolve and then ALL  Government Departments involved  for incompetence, failure to resolve and dereliction of duty.

@BenM_Anderson @EnvAgencyMids I think it's about current landfill capacity too. Large reduction in the number of landfills in the last decade. Not enough waste being processed by greener methods. Slow uptake on recycling. They're still heavily reliant on landfill. If they close the site, there is no Plan B.

@CavernamVenenum @EnvAgencyMids .. and without it, the EA are a craven organisation, unable/unwilling to seriously threaten polluters, who know the EA will only prosecute as a last resort, and has done increasingly rarely over the last decade.

@CavernamVenenum @EnvAgencyMids But surely the govt. could just step in and compulsory purchase order the land. I assume that is just considered too expensive (since they would then also have to pay for clean up, with or without a fine). With enough funding though, this can surely be fixed?

@davemh72 @JuliaBradbury @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgency @DefraUKAir @DefraGovUK @MattHancock @BorisJohnson The council wrote to @MPGeorgeEustice with clear& sensible reasons why they wanted an enquiry into the @EnvAgency s poor regulation. https://t.co/NoZktX1Fln accountability ,no responsibility at all,no message from George to the town. Nothing  #stopthestink

urls.title: Environment Agency enforcement and sanctions policy
urls.description: We use some essential cookies to make this website work. We‚Äôd like to set additional cookies to understand how you use GOV.UK, remember your settings and improve government services. We also use cookies set by other sites to help us deliver content from their services. Where we have identified any third party copyright information you will need to obtain permission from the copyright holders concerned. This publication is available at https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/environment-agency-enforcement

urls.title: River Thames Conditions
urls.description: Welcome to the Environment Agency's online River Thames conditions update service which displays our current advice to river users. We display warning boards at our locks to inform river users of conditions that may make navigating difficult and dangerous. This page shows our current advice for each reach of the river between Cricklade and Teddington. We will update this information regularly when warning boards are being displayed at locks and as river conditions change. Upstream of St John's Lock No
